purpose: Display a single pricing tier with features, price, and call-to-action button for landing page pricing sections

props.name: tierName
props.description: The name of the pricing tier (e.g., 'Starter', 'Pro', 'Enterprise')

props.name: description
props.description: Brief description of what the tier includes

props.name: features
props.description: List of features included in this pricing tier

props.name: highlighted
props.description: Whether this tier should be visually emphasized as recommended

slots.name: header
slots.description: Custom header content above the tier name

slots.name: footer
slots.description: Custom footer content below the CTA button

slots.name: featureIcon
slots.description: Custom icon to display next to each feature

responsiveBehavior: Full width on mobile, fixed width in grid on tablet/desktop. Stack vertically when screen width is less than 640px.

accessibility.keyboardNavigation: CTA button must be focusable and activatable via Enter/Space. Tab order should flow naturally through the card.
accessibility.screenReaderNotes: Card should announce tier name, price, and feature count. Features list should be announced as a list.

contentConstraints: Tier name should be concise (max 20 characters)
Price should include currency symbol and billing period
CTA text should be action-oriented (max 25 characters)
nonGoals: Does not support feature comparison across tiers
Does not include animations or transitions
exampleUseCase: A SaaS landing page displaying three pricing tiers (Starter, Pro, Enterprise) with the Pro tier highlighted as the recommended option.
